edu.xtec.jclic

Class Activity

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.xtec.jclic.Activity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Constants, Editable, Domable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CrossWord, DoublePuzzle, ExchangePuzzle, Explore, HolePuzzle, Identify, InformationScreen, MemoryGame, Menu, SimpleAssociation, TextActivityBase, WordSearch, WrittenAnswer

    public abstract class Activity
extends Object
implements Constants, Editable, Domable
    Activity is the abstract base class for JClic activities. It defines also the inner class Activity.Panel, wich is responsible of the user interaction with the activity content. Activities should extend both Activity and Activity.Panel classes in order to become fully operative. JClic stores activities in memory as Element objects. So, all non-transient data must be stored to and retrieved from JDom elements.
    Version:
    13.09.10
    Author:
    Francesc Busquets (fbusquets@xtec.cat)

    • Field Detail

      • project

        protected JClicProject project
        The JClicProject this activity belongs to.

      • name

        public String name
        The activity name

      • code

        public String code
        Code used in reports to filter queries. Default is null.

      • description

        public String description
        Description of the activity.

      • margin

        public int margin
        Space, measured in pixels, between the activity components.

      • bgColor

        public Color bgColor
        Background color of the activity panel.

      • bgGradient

        public Gradient bgGradient
        Gradient used to draw the background of the activity panel.

      • tiledBgImg

        public boolean tiledBgImg
        Whether the bgImage (if any) has to be tiled across the panel background.

      • bgImageFile

        public String bgImageFile
        Filename of the image painted in the panel background. Default is null.

      • border

        public boolean border
        Whether to draw a border around the activity panel.

      • absolutePositioned

        public boolean absolutePositioned
        Whether to place the activity panel at the point specified by absolutePosition, or leave it centered in the main window of the player.

      • absolutePosition

        public Point absolutePosition
        Position of the activity panel into the Player.

      • includeInReports

        public boolean includeInReports
        Whether to generate usage reports.

      • reportActions

        public boolean reportActions
        Whether to send action events to the Reporter.

      • helpWindow

        public boolean helpWindow
        Whether to have a help window or not.

      • showSolution

        public boolean showSolution
        Whether to show the solution on the help window.

      • helpMsg

        public String helpMsg
        Message to show in the help window when showSolution is false.

      • eventSounds

        public EventSounds eventSounds
        Specific set of EventSounds used in the activity. The default is null, meaning to use the Player sounds.

      • useOrder

        public boolean useOrder
        Wheter the activity must be solved in a specific order. The default is false.

      • dragCells

        public boolean dragCells
        Wheter the cells of the activity will be dragged across the screen. When false, a line will be painted to link elements.

      • skinFileName

        public String skinFileName
        File name of the Skin used by the activity. The default value is null, meaning that the activity will use the skin specified for the project.

      • maxTime

        public int maxTime
        Maximum amount of time (seconds) to solve the activity. The default value is 0, meaning unlimited time.

      • countDownTime

        public boolean countDownTime
        Whether the time counter should display a countdown when maxTime > 0.

      • maxActions

        public int maxActions
        Maximum number of actions allowed to solve the activity. The default value is 0, meaning unlimited actions.

      • countDownActions

        public boolean countDownActions
        Whether the actions counter should display a countdown when maxActions > 0.

      • infoUrl

        public String infoUrl
        String with the URL to be displayed when the user clicks on the info button. Default is null.

      • infoCmd

        public String infoCmd
        System command to be executed when the user clicks the info button. Default is null. Applets have this function disabled.

      • MSG_TYPE

        public static final String[] MSG_TYPE
        String labels corresponding to the four identifiers of JClic messages: PREVIOUS, MAIN, END and END_ERROR.

      • PREVIOUS

        public static final int PREVIOUS
        Identifier of the message displayed before the activity starts. Used only in certain types of activities.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MAIN

        public static final int MAIN
        Identifier of the main message, displayed as long as the activity is playing.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • END

        public static final int END
        Identifier of the message displayed when the user successfully ends the activity.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • END_ERROR

        public static final int END_ERROR
        Identifier of the message displayed when the user exceeds the maximum amount of time or actions allowed.
        See Also:
        maxTime, maxActions, Constant Field Values

        Returns the Editor associated to this object.
        Specified by:
        getEditor in interface Editable
        Parameters:
        parent - Editors can have a parent editor. Childs should communicate its changes to parents, and changes in parents should affect its childs. This parameter can be null in stand-alone objects.
        Returns:
        An Editor for this object.
